title: Old Agfa Logo Font
content:
Can anyone tell me what the font used in the old Agfa logo is? You can see it in use in the address below in the word "graff" (large orange JPEG on the right.   
   
 [http://www.holdnohostage.co.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017110514/http:/www.holdnohostage.co.uk/)   
   
Any help would be much appreciated. Thanks.
author: stimuli

comments.content:
That Agfa mark is probably not a font, but it is nice.   
I'm guessing hostage boys did that on their own.   
   
Stephen

Hey,

even 10 years later answer is maybe a bit to late ;)  
This is what I found out till now:  
The original Logotype was made in 1923. But I have no idea by whom.  
In 1984 Schlagheck & Schultes made the "new" identity.

All the best,  
Vinzent
